introduction: Between Love and Friendship the Answer is Revealed.Annabeth Gish	... 	GilleryAllison Smith	... 	BernadetteJulie Ann Emery	... 	AbbieJeanette Brox	... 	BlakeTimothy Brennen	... 	JustinEdward James Gage	... 	LarryGILLERY'S LITTLE SECRET is a female-driven examination of the depth that lies between love and friendship. Gillery Poiencot returns home for her 20th high school reunion. While there, she is confronted by a young girl seeking answers that she believes only Gillery can resolve. However, her journey to answer these questions forces her to confront a past love, uncovering a hidden secret only now forced into the light after eighteen years.  Written by T.M. Scorzafava@彩虹左岸
